Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: b-u=šəkəl-ano ʕAlo i=nuro šaġilo aʕle l-u=goran d-i=ḥaqsiziye d-səmle ʕal af=faqire w ʕal am=məskine w hul d-xaməd w mayəṯ b-i=dukto
translations: so brannte das Feuer den ʕAlo, entsprechend dem Unrecht, das er an den Armen verübt hatte, bis er verkohlte und an Ort und Stelle starb

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: Qṭile be áydarbo qṭile Xandaq xamido NE_Boses and Shushan
translations: ‘He killed him, at the moment he killed him, Xandeq collapsed/crumbled into dust’

tokens.value: ‘He killed him, at the moment he killed him, Xandeq collapsed/crumbled into dust’

Preterit Intransitive.text: Qṭile, be áydarbo qṭile, Xandaq xamido ‘He killed him, at the moment he killed him, Xandeq collapsed/crumbled into dust’ (NE_Boses and Shushan)

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: . Ilyas says that this verb is used typically to talk about thr fire so here he imagines that something similar happened. He also approved yığılma as a possible turkish translation Ilyas p.c.
